resources.string: Discard the changes made on this file?

Any changes you’ve made are saved locally at: \'Download → aXML Editor → %s\'\n\nImportant: aXML Editor does not store your APK files. To continue working on this project later, please make sure to reopen the same APK file.
Are you sure you want to exit this project?
Save the following file to device storage?
The selected file is saved to: \'Download → aXML Editor → %s\'
Invalid file. Please select a valid binary XML or APK file…
There are no changes to build…

Your modified APK has been generated and signed successfully.

The APK has been saved to: 'Download → aXML Editor'

Note: You may need to uninstall any existing version of this app before installing, due to a signature mismatch.
Remove the following line from this XML?
